ðŸ“– Summary: Quarkdown is a Markdown-based typesetting system that extends Markdown with functions and allows compiling a project into various formats like books, presentations, and articles. It features a standard library, custom function definitions, live preview, and fast compilation, enabling users to create complex and dynamic content.
